alert.note: Alert for Logan; Menard; Sangamon (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 2:14PM CDT until August 03 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Menard County in central Illinois... Southwestern Logan County in central Illinois... North central Sangamon County in central Illinois... * Until 300 PM CDT. * At 214 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Middletown, or 12 miles south of Mason City, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Williamsville around 230 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Elkhart and Cornland. This includes Interstate 55 between mile markers 108 and 121. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
